meanings.definition: Relating to the development or growth of a person or thing.
meanings.sent1: The developmentally delayed child showed progress in his learning.
meanings.sent2: She works with developmentally challenged individuals to help them thrive.
meanings.sent3: The developmentally curious puppy explored every corner of the room.
meanings.sent4: Her garden was a developmentally rich environment for the plants to flourish.
meanings.sent5: The teacher used developmentally appropriate activities to engage the students.

meanings.definition: In a manner that pertains to the progress or advancement of a process or situation.
meanings.sent1: He developmentally improved his skills through consistent practice.
meanings.sent2: The project team worked developmentally to meet the deadline.
meanings.sent3: The cat watched developmentally as the mouse scurried across the floor.
meanings.sent4: The river flowed developmentally towards the vast ocean.
meanings.sent5: She spoke developmentally, ensuring everyone understood the instructions.
